definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一个小男孩下到马达加斯加南部的一个蓝宝石矿里。

sentences.english: With direction index, sapphire cover lens, never abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 带有方向标，蓝宝石镜头，永不磨损。

sentences.english: Dazzle her with these one of a kind sapphire and diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: 这款精致炫目的蓝宝石钻石耳环一定令她惊喜不已。

sentences.english: Abundant fluid melt inclusions are found in the crystals of ruby and sapphire.
sentences.chinese: 脉体中的红蓝宝石晶体中发现大量流体熔融包裹体。

sentences.english: Secrets are worth more than silver or sapphires, Varys claimed.
sentences.chinese: 瓦利斯声称秘密远比银子和蓝宝石有价值。

sentences.english: It's a blue sapphire surrounded by diamonds set in white gold.
sentences.chinese: 是一枚有钻石围绕，在白金底上镶有蓝宝石的戒指。

sentences.english: I recommend aquamarine or rose quartz for those who are experiencing a lot of grief.
sentences.chinese: 我建议海蓝宝石或玫瑰谁是为那些经历很辛苦石英。

sentences.english: Sapphire and faded jeans, I hope you get your dreams.
sentences.chinese: 穿上已褪色的蓝宝石色的牛仔裤，我希望你做追梦人。

sentences.english: Aquamarine is said to symbolize happiness and understanding.
sentences.chinese: 海蓝宝石是说，象征幸福和理解。

sentences.english: There were opals and sapphires, the former in cups of crystal, and the latter in cups of jade.
sentences.chinese: 水晶杯里盛着蛋白石，碧玉杯里载着蓝宝石。

sentences.english: It can therefore, be deduced that the protolith from which sapphirine was derived is not necessarily magnesiorich pelite.
sentences.chinese: 含假蓝宝石的变质岩石之原岩未必是富镁泥质岩。

sentences.english: I heard aquamarine is the new black.
sentences.chinese: 我听到海蓝宝石是新的黑色。

sentences.english: You can get aquamarines in a variety of cuts and sizes in addition to a variety of colors.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在各种海蓝宝石的削减规模的除了多种颜色。

sentences.english: Sapphire Energy seems one of the best-positioned companies to do that.
sentences.chinese: 蓝宝石能源公司算是同类公司中处境最好的了。

definition: lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
